did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research, but no reproduction is allowed. Special arrangements will be necessary to gain access to some items in this collection.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library. No reproduction is allowed.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Clear Pictures Film Footage Collection, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Preliminary processing by Alice Poffinberger and Lisa Stark
Updated by Kirston Johnson and John Mayrose
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.
This collection is unprocessed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Based on his memoir of the same name, Clear Pictures is a documentary film on Southern writer, Duke University alumnus and professor Reynolds Price. The film was created by Charles Guggenheim.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of film footage (sync reels, workprint reels, stock footage, research tapes, etc.) created in the making of the film Clear Pictures, a documentary on Reynolds Price by Charles Guggenheim. Interviews of friends and colleagues were recorded, as well as of Price himself, documenting his range of activity and long literary career. A few paper files and electronic data are also included. See the Reynolds Price Papers also in this repository. The addition (2 items; dated January 23, 1990) contains two 3/4" U-matic videocassette tapes.
Special arrangements will be necessary to gain access to some items in this collection. Please inquire.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These are searchable subject entries for this collection. Performing a search on these subjects in the Duke University Libraries online catalog will bring up other related research materials.

Electronic files of some of the documents above on 3.5" DOS Disks (Disks 001 and 002) (D. Bono) were originally filed in this box.

scopecontent.p: These two disks (Disks 001 and 002) were removed, and files migrated to server. See staff for assistance.
Label for Disk 001 was marked:PRICE1.EDL/PRICE2.EDL/ Guggenheim "Reynolds Price." Label for Disk 002 was marked:PRICE1.CMS/PRICE2.CMS/ Guggenheim "Reynolds Price"

Electronic files on one disk (Disk 004) were originally filed in this box.

scopecontent.p: This Mac disk held five different files--all holding a title graphic for "D-Day Remembered" with slightly different fonts. Files copied to server. The disk was removed and discarded. See staff for assistance.
Label for Disk 004 was marked: FRAME SHOP/84857-H1[?]. Filenames were the following: ddayone.eps; ddaytwo.eps; ddaythree.eps; ddayfour.eps; ddayfive.eps. Titlebar on screen: Bob Oliver 969-0340 x373
